description: Basket-of-gold (Aurinia saxatilis) is an amazing plant species that blooms stunning clusters of yellow flowers throughout the summer. Not only is the plant beautiful, it's also incredibly low-maintenance, making it perfect for beginner gardeners. The fuzzy leaves also add a unique texture and visual interest. Basket-of-gold can grow in a variety of soil types, and is drought tolerant, making it an ideal choice for dry and arid landscapes. In addition, its foliage retains its bright, golden color throughout the winter months, providing a nice pop of color to your garden during the colder months. Basket-of-gold certainly is an outstanding plant species!
